name: Van Helsing: Hunter or Hunted
summary:
Legendary vampire hunter Van Helsing has been captured by the Lord Of Darkness himself, Dracula!

The Hunter has to resort to stealth, creeping around a dungeon in Dracula's castle, avoiding threats, and collecting items. Once he has collected all parts of his weapon, he can turn the tide on the enemies that were terrorizing before, and possibly even put an end to Dracula's evil for good.

Hide, explore, and kill in this stealth/fps mashup based on the classic rivalry!
